snippet: President Obama’s budget proposal would prevent money from being spent on inspections of horse slaughtering facilities.
abstract: Pres Obama’s 2014 budget includes proposal that would prevent money from being spent on inspections of horse slaughtering facilities; proposal would effectively ban slaughter of horses for human consumption.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s budget proposal would prevent money from being spent on inspections of horse slaughtering facilities.

headline.seo: Obama Moves to Block Slaughter of Horses for Meat
headline.main: Obama Moves to Block Horse Slaughter
